quotes.quote: The average person's ear weighs what you are, not what you were
Your dreaming self seeks to tell you something your waking ears will not hear
I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage. They've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
The walls will always have ears when you whisper in secret.
Women love with their ears, men with their eyes.
It is with our voices we remember, with our ears we understand.
God has given you two ears--that should tell you something about the importance of listening.
Give every man thy ear, but few thy voice.
For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
Men trust their ears less than their eyes.
I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears.
Beethoven's Fifth Symphony is the most sublime noise that has ever penetrated into the ear of man.
A statesman who keeps his ear permanently glued to the ground will have neither elegance of posture nor flexibility of movement.
The ear of the leader must ring with the voices of the people.
I really don't have an ear for pitch. I can't sing at all, I can't hum melodies and I can't write riffs.
You can't go to the store and buy a good ear and rhythm.
By the visual pattern, but mostly I'm guided entirely by my ear, what I hear.
The talent of a true writer and poet is in the ear
You must lend an ear today, because we are the leaders of tomorrow
Whenever death may surprise us, let it be welcome if our battle cry has reached even one receptive ear and another hand reaches out to take up our arms.
When music fails to agree to the ear, to soothe the ear and the heart and the senses, then it has missed the point.
Mentoring is a brain to pick, an ear to listen, and a push in the right direction.
Listen and attend with the ear of your heart.
